title: Little Devil Teemo Icon?
body: It says that you have to defeat the teemo in doom bots before Nov 3rd in order to get the icon. I've beat doom bots and some of my friends have the icon but I haven't gotten the icon yet. Do you have to get the final hit on the teemo in order to get it or something?

replies.body: Icons will be distributed to eligible players, and the current aim is to have that finished by November 17th.  Some players might receiver them sooner than others, but hang tight until then.   The goodies will come!
Alright, thanks for clearing that up!

I only just received my Little Devil Teemo icon, as of March 27th in the AM.
Wasn't expecting it, as I didn't know it was a thing before. But thanks!
that moment when im one of the few players ho love playing teemo, has him lvl 7 and the devil skin and the cherry on top is the icon wich i dont have dono why :'(
.....Why...........do you enjoy ruining peoples days by playing teemo? WHYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY
Cuz teemo is life bro!! hes way harder to master then most of the people think its an art and a science at the same time! {{champion:17}}

Yea I was just wondering about that, I made sure to beat the guantlet once and I see people with the icon but I haven't recieved it yet. Hoping they do give them out soon, I really wanted it and I even bought the skin.

As long as its guaranteed.  I wanted to use that as my default icon and beat both modes the day they came out, but I've seen about 5 people now with the icon and I'm wondering why the winners from day one didn't get the icon first.
does it have to be this weekend? or could you have won last weekend? because i cant seem to get another win but i did beat it last week :/
Im defeat the Teemo on doom bots and havent got the icon. Im defeat him with my friend and he's got the icon but im not.
